units.name: Marksman
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets â€” medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

units.name: Weaver
units.prompt: Place traps on tiles enemies are likely to move through. Use pulse if 2+ enemies are adjacent. Stay near allies for mutual support.

units.name: Lens
units.prompt: Scan early to give your team intel on enemy prompts. Target enemy specters with scan to track them after cloak. Use recalibrate on allies who need tactical adjustments. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

player.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.

units.name: Prophet
units.prompt: Scan priority targets each turn to reveal their strategy. Use recalibrate on your damage dealer to boost effectiveness. Stay behind allies and maintain range. Never get adjacent to enemy vectors.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

units.name: Pulse
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

opponent.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.
